Text.Name: Boss_JiaolongFight
Text.DisplayName: มังกรหลาก Battle Stats

Text.Name: Boss_Jiaolong_Part
Text.DisplayName: มังกรหลาก Body Part

Text.Name: Boss_Jiaolong_Part1
Text.DisplayName: มังกรหลาก body part weakened

Text.Name: Boss_Jiaolong_JiSiGongYang
Text.Desc: The demonic dragon has obtained strength from the sacrificial offerings, its พลังชี่ has become even thicker.

Text.Name: Boss_Jiaolong_Shuiling
Text.Desc: มังกรหลาก concentrates the power of Water Spirit until it reaches 100 stacks, by which time a huge flood will be released.

Text.Name: Boss_Jiaolong_LongNu
Text.Desc: The demonic dragon enters a state of fury, causing an increase in all stats.

Text.Name: Boss_Jiaolong_Longxi
Text.Desc: The demonic dragon takes a deep breath, causing the water within your character's body to quickly diminish.

Text.Name: Boss_Jiaolong_fanshi
Text.DisplayName: Backfire - มังกรหลาก's Counterattack
Text.Desc: มังกรหลาก will make an Artifact backfire on its owner after a period of time, causing the Artifact พลังชี่ to be reduced by half. The effect is doubled for Artifacts of Fire element, and halved for those of Earth element.
